original_text: The first thing Andrew did was to find his brother Simon and tell him, “We have found the Messiah” (that is, the Christ).
korean_text: 그가 먼저 자기의 형제 시몬을 찾아 말하되 우리가 메시야를 만났다 하고 (메시야는 번역하면 그리스도라)

sentences.original_text: The first thing Andrew did was to find his brother Simon
sentences.korean_translation: 안드레가 한 첫 번째 일은 그의 형제 시몬을 찾는 것이었습니다
